description: Community-driven extensions for the M-Files Vault Application Framework.
releaseNotes:
Changes included in 22.10.39-split-timespanex
https://github.com/M-Files/VAF.Extensions.Community/commit/ec2fd3e1c67265cf565d7b2fe266411afd6bfab4
DefaultValueHandling = Newtonsoft.Json.DefaultValueHandling.Include
Solves issue with loading data from a "default" value of a type, even though that's not the default value of a property.
https://github.com/M-Files/VAF.Extensions.Community/commit/e8efe4801ea3ef37c13e178aa73354de852f71f1
Lots of fixes to serialization.
Unit tests for above.
https://github.com/M-Files/VAF.Extensions.Community/commit/b405ffc939fc20422f4fc4c67dfaa2a60ba88595
Better handling of null values.
https://github.com/M-Files/VAF.Extensions.Community/commit/81bf20099bcd82bfcaa4c7f5bfaef873929971e8
Implemented unit tests for other types of default values.
Implemented fixes for above.
https://github.com/M-Files/VAF.Extensions.Community/commit/e4b3e7d39cc9da9f90d7f36403aa3756b13e106a
Enabled upgrade methods to specify that they want the data as a string or JObject, rather than deserialized.
https://github.com/M-Files/VAF.Extensions.Community/commit/9a9986800820a83fa9d30377ef9cf1c127b6bd18
Added ability for upgrade methods to have a parameter for the JObject of the actual source content.

More comment fixes.

Fixed comments.

Serialization will not save default values.
Default values declared via [JsonConfEditor] will not be saved when the configuration is updated.

Removed unused code.
Commenting and code style.
Moved some tests to correctly-named files.

Added preview text for frequency and timespanex.

Moved comment copying to SingleNamedValueItemUpgradeRule (so applied to all migrations).
Moved ensuring of latest serialization to separate rule which is always applied.

Better debug message.

Added basic functionality - and tests - to copy comments.
Only works on the final upgrade stage; needs work to apply on all upgrade rules.

Added code to allow comments to be copied from one JObject to another.

Split classes out into separate files.

Added unit tests for AreEqual.

Fixed issue with initializing task manager logger

CI changes (remove need for prerelease branch): (#74)
Build now runs on PR/MR targeting main/master.
Build-and-publish now only runs on release.
Manual build can be run against master to default to "-prerelease" suffix.
